title: SoC SAI 401-0-22 Topics in Sound Production

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class is an introduction to using sound to tell true stories. We will dissect several seminal radio documentaries and discuss interviewing techniques, ethics and narrative structure. Students will individually produce a 5-10-minute audio documentary as part of the course. Note: There will be significant time spent gathering audio in the field as part of this course.
